|brand = ASUS |model = SRT-AC1900 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = ASUS OnHub |revision = A |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = November 1, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_SRT-AC1900_(ASUS_OnHub) |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-SRTAC1900 |icid = 3568A-SRTAC1900 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = ASUS RT-AC60U |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->

|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Micron;MTFC4GACAAAM-1MWT; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = Serial(SPI-NOR) |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Micron;N25Q064A; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->

|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Coreboot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, ZigBee, speaker |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz 256QAM LNA Module;Skyworks;SKY65971-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz WLAN Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY85405;;3; ,,, 5GHz 802.11ac LNA Module;Skyworks;SKY65981-11;;3; ,,, 2.4GHz Bluetooth Radio Chip;Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;;1; ,,, SoC Network Co-Processor for ZigBee;Silicon Labs;EM3581;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz ZigBee/Smart Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY66109-1;;1; ,,, Trusted Platform Module;Infineon;SLB9615;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1300 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9882;QCA9882-BR4A, FNPT344.K4, 1514, TAIWAN; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 1 |rad3rxchains = 1 |rad3sstreams = 1 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam3 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad3ac = <!-- 433, 867, 1300, 1733, Maximum throughput rated at --> |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = <!-- 150, 300, 450, 600, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3g = <!-- 54, 108, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3b = <!-- 11, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3a = <!-- 54, Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad3freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "ASUS RT-AC60U", "REV.1.20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :2 boards (Wi-Fi and Main)
*''ASUS SRT-AC1900 Wireless Smart Router'' :Model: SRT-AC1900 H/W Ver: A :*Setup network: Setup0A34 :*Setup code: pttmmbwmm
See also [[TP-LINK TGR1900 (Google OnHub)]].. [https://on.google.com/hub/#specs Google OnHub Spec] {{FCC ST|11/26/2015|imdexme.}} <!--*[https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_srt-ac1900_a ''Asus SRT-AC1900'' on '''LEDE Project'''] ([https://lede-project.org/toh/hwdata/asus/start HW Data])-->
===Specifications=== *Processor: Qualcomm IPQ8064 @ 1.4 GHz Dual-core *Flash: 4GB (eMMC), 8MB (NOR), Memory: 1GB (DDR3) *Radio: QCA9880 3x3 (2.4 GHz), QCA9880 3x3 (5 GHz) :Congestion Sensing Radio: QCA9882 1x1 (2.4/5GHz) *Operating frequency: Simultaneous Dual-band 2.4/5 GHz *Wireless support: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac Wi-Fi AC1900 :Bluetooth Smart Ready, Weave ready, 802.15.4 ready *Antenna: 1x Zigbee antenna, 1x Bluetooth antenna, :7x Smart high-performance internal Wi-Fi antennas *Switch: Qualcomm Atheros QCA8337 (GbE) *Wired support: 1x GbE WAN, 1x GbE LAN port *Lighting: Subtle lighting on the base (tri-color LED) :Proximity Sensor, Speaker, TPM (trusted boot) *Dimensions: 132 mm x 127 mm x 200 mm (WxDxH) *Weight: 800 g *Color: Slate Gray
===Features=== *Intelligent internal antenna array pushes 802.11ac Wi-Fi speeds up to 1900Mbps *ASUS Wave Control lets prioritize traffic to devices with a wave of your hand *Smart high-performance internal antennas, selected power amplifiers and fine- :tuned radio frequency design deliver wide wireless coverage in any direction *Congestion-sensing antenna for the least-crowded channel to Wi-Fi performance *Firmware is automatically updated with the latest features and security upgrades *The Google On app for Android and iOS allows simple setup and management
==Links of Interest== ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32868-asus-onhub-router-launched ''ASUS OnHub Router Launched'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://googleblog.blogspot.ru/2015/10/more-ways-to-wi-fi-with-new-asus-onhub.html ''More ways to Wi-Fi with the new ASUS OnHub'' on '''GoogleBlog'''] *[http://www.asus.com/us/News/21L1ulvOKFo77SmA ''ASUS and Google Announce the OnHub SRT-AC1900 Router'' on '''ASUS (US)'''] *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/asus-google-onhub-ac1900-router,30424.html ''Asus Google AC1900 OnHub Router for the Smart Home'' on '''TomsHardware''']
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32889-asus-google-onhub-reviewed ''ASUS Google OnHub Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/OnHub+Teardown/48129 ''Teardown Google OnHub'' on '''iFixit''']
